00017 EIG_PQ::EIG_PQ(int M,int N){
00018    
00019    this->N = N;
00020    this->M = M;
00021    this->n_tp = M*(M - 1)/2;
00022 
00023    this->dim = 2*n_tp;
00024 
00025    eig = new double * [2];
00026 
00027    eig[0] = new double [dim];
00028    eig[1] = eig[0] + n_tp;
00029 
00030 }

00037 EIG_PQ::EIG_PQ(EIG_PQ &eig_c){
00038 
00039    this->N = eig_c.N;
00040    this->M = eig_c.M;
00041    this->n_tp = eig_c.n_tp;
00042 
00043    this->dim = 2*n_tp;
00044 
00045    eig = new double * [2];
00046 
00047    eig[0] = new double [dim];
00048    eig[1] = eig[0] + n_tp;
00049 
00050    int inc = 1;
00051 
00052    dcopy_(&dim,eig_c.eig[0],&inc,eig[0],&inc);
00053

00061 EIG_PQ::EIG_PQ(SUP_PQ &SZ){
00062 
00063    this->N = SZ.gN();
00064    this->M = SZ.gM();
00065    this->n_tp = SZ.gn_tp();
00066 
00067    this->dim = 2*n_tp;
00068 
00069    eig = new double * [2];
00070 
00071    eig[0] = new double [dim];
00072    eig[1] = eig[0] + n_tp;
00073 
00074    //dit vernietigd de originele matrix!
00075    for(int i = 0;i < 2;++i)
00076       SZ.tpm(i).diagonalize(eig[i]);
00077 
00078 }

00171 double EIG_PQ::lsfunc(double alpha){
00172 
00173    double ward = 0.0;
00174 
00175    for(int i = 0;i < n_tp;++i)
00176       ward += eig[0][i]/(1.0 + alpha*eig[0][i]);
00177 
00178    for(int i = 0;i < n_tp;++i)
00179       ward += eig[1][i]/(1.0 + alpha*eig[1][i]);
00180 
00181    return ward;
00182 
00183 }
00184 
00188 double EIG_PQ::min(){
00189 
00190    double ward;
00191 
00192    if(eig[0][0] < eig[1][0])
00193       ward = eig[0][0];
00194    else
00195       ward = eig[1][0];
00196 
00197    return ward;
00198 
00199 }
